title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior with custom session tracking cookie name
description: Bug 49299 - In Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1, it is stated that a custom session tracking cookie name should affect URL rewriting. However, the behavior observed is different.
OB: When a custom name is configured for session tracking cookies, the actual result is that the cookie set has the custom name, but when the Reload link on the page is clicked, the jsessionid parameter is used instead of the custom cookie name in the URL.
EB: Expected Behavior: Following the statement in 7.1.1, when a custom name is configured for session tracking cookies, the Reload link should use the custom cookie name instead of the jsessionid parameter in the URL.
